text:
<@U05KNCMAE7N> two other icons we’ve found a use for:
• <https://github.com/tailwindlabs/heroicons/blob/master/optimized/24/solid/home.svg|“Home” icon>
• <https://github.com/tailwindlabs/heroicons/blob/master/optimized/24/solid/light-bulb.svg|“Idea” / bulb>

GraphQL has been a huge win for us. It makes it much simpler to do complicated multi-object calls. For example, listing 10 different properties on 20 associated companies. Much simpler and faster for us to execute on.

1. GQL, Company, Deal, Contact, Quote, User/Owner APIs. Creating/updating/fetching information.
2. Nothing super complicated from our side. We’re working on extending quite a bit of functionality on Line Items and Quotes.
3. We haven’t really bumped into anything too challenging, but we’ve also worked with the API for a while in e.g. Code Action Workflows.
4. Rest for reading/updating single or simple queries. Anything that involves associated or multiple objects, we usually go for GQL.
do the internal CRM Cards use any sort of Command pattern? We're getting a error related to a command pattern and figured i'd ask before I go investigating the source

:alert: :wave: Hello everyone! We just discovered a temporary issue where some Apps w/CRM Cards built & deployed this afternoon resulted in a broken experience in the CRM UI.

*tl;dr:* If your deployed cards are failing to render, displaying an alert: "*There was a problem displaying this content*", you can resolve the issue yourself by running another `hs project upload` from the HubSpot CLI to generate a new project build.

More details in the :thread:

*Timeline:* builds that were deployed between 1:19pm–5:21pm ET (UTC−04:00)

*Steps to remedy the issue:*
1. In your terminal, navigate to your project's code directory.
2. Re-deploy your app using the command: `hs project upload`
3. Wait for the build & deploy to complete
4. View your card on the CRM Record page to confirm whether or not your card is working correctly again.

*Q: How can I determine if my app is affected?*

If you have a project that contains a UI extension card and the project was deployed between 1:19PM to 5:21PM ET on July 26, the card may fail to render.

These screenshots show some of the symptoms you might see in the 1) CRM UI and 2) in the browser's network tab.

You may also see messages similar to these in the browser console:
> Error: [Iframe] The src provided is not a valid URL
Or:
> Error: [HubSpot.extend]: We were unable to load your extension

That should resolve any issues :pray: , but please let us know if this persists for you after following those steps!

Have a great weekend everyone!
